name: Test Group 1.1: Registration Mode -> SC-IT.Conf.1.1.1: Registration Setup
description: This test case verifies SIP-PBX Registration during the initial setup phase.

name: Test Group 1.1: Registration Mode -> SC-IT.Conf.1.1.3: Maintaining Registration (Part 1 / Expires = 60s)
description: This test verifies that a SIP-PBX honors the REGISTER expiry timer provided by the SP-SSE.

name: Test Group 1.1: Registration Mode -> SC-IT.Conf.1.1.3: Maintaining Registration (Part 2 / Expires = 120s)
description: This test verifies that a SIP-PBX honors the REGISTER expiry timer provided by the SP-SSE.

name: Test Group 1.1: Registration Mode -> SC-IT.Conf.1.1.3: Maintaining Registration (Part 3 / Expires = 30s)
description: This test verifies that a SIP-PBX honors the REGISTER expiry timer provided by the SP-SSE.
